title: Quiz
content:
Chapter Quiz

Answer the following questions to check your understanding of this chapter's topics.

questions.question: In the context of 'Authentication and Security', which statement about rate limiting & abuse prevention is most accurate?
choices: Rate Limiting & Abuse Prevention always requires external services to work in Streamlit.
Rate Limiting & Abuse Prevention is useful in some cases, but you should evaluate complexity and UX trade-offs.
Rate Limiting & Abuse Prevention is deprecated and should be avoided in all Streamlit apps.
Rate Limiting & Abuse Prevention only works when running Streamlit in Docker.
questions.explanation: Rate Limiting & Abuse Prevention is a powerful pattern, but like most advanced techniques, it should be used judiciously with attention to user impact and maintainability.

questions.question: In the context of 'Authentication and Security', which statement about signed cookies & headers is most accurate?
choices: Signed Cookies & Headers always requires external services to work in Streamlit.
Signed Cookies & Headers is useful in some cases, but you should evaluate complexity and UX trade-offs.
Signed Cookies & Headers is deprecated and should be avoided in all Streamlit apps.
Signed Cookies & Headers only works when running Streamlit in Docker.
questions.explanation: Signed Cookies & Headers is a powerful pattern, but like most advanced techniques, it should be used judiciously with attention to user impact and maintainability.

Compliance & PII Handling is deprecated and should be avoided in all Streamlit apps.
Compliance & PII Handling only works when running Streamlit in Docker.
